Welcome To Aisha


 Commands for Personal Assistant

 1. For opening Internet
 say "Open web"\ or "set web"\ 

 2. For Setting Alarm
 say "set Alarm"

 3. For Play all Song
 say "songs"\ 

 4. For play particular song
 say "play song song_name"\ 

5. For Opening Any Application
 say "open app name"

6.For Changing Mode i.e SilentGeneral,Vibrate 
 say "put Mobile on Silent,General,Vibrate Mode"

7.For Playing Video
 say "play video video name"

 8.For Video Songs List 
 say "Videos"
